âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Web analytics metrics (sessions, users, pageviews, bounce rate, session duration) â€¢ Privacy-friendly (no cookies or user tracking, GDPR & CCPA compliant) â€¢ Customizable goals, retention, user journeys, and funnels dashboards â€¢ Advanced filtering across 15+ dimensions â€¢ Custom events with JSON properties
ðŸ“– Summary: Rybbit is an open-source analytics tool designed as a privacy-focused alternative to Google Analytics. It offers comprehensive web analytics metrics, customizable dashboards, and advanced filtering, all while ensuring GDPR and CCPA compliance through cookie-less tracking. Rybbit can be self-hosted or used as a hosted service.
